title: Dilution Series for Biophysical Assays
author: Opentrons
description: With this protocol, your robot can perform 6 dilutions down a 96-well plate using a P50 and P300 multi-channel pipettes.
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will transfer 90 uL buffer from trough to all columns of the 96-well plate.
Robot will transfer and mix 10 uL solvent from trough to column 1 of the 96-well plate.
Robot will transfer and mix 50 uL of column 1 to column 2.
Robot will repeat step 8 until column 6.
notes:
Trough setup
 Buffer: A1
 Solvent: A2
If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Dilution Series for Biophysical Assays
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: With this protocol, your robot can perform 6 dilutions down a 96-well plate using a P50 and P300 multi-channel pipettes.
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
6. Robot will transfer 90 uL buffer from trough to all columns of the 96-well plate.
7. Robot will transfer and mix 10 uL solvent from trough to column 1 of the 96-well plate.
8. Robot will transfer and mix 50 uL of column 1 to column 2.
9. Robot will repeat step 8 until column 6.
markdown.notes:
Trough setup
* Buffer: A1
* Solvent: A2

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
